lead_paragraph: David Wildstein, the mastermind behind the lane closings, said Gov. Chris Christie was informed of the lane closings at a Sept. 11 memorial service the week they were happening.

headline.print_headline: Ex-Ally Says Scheme Made Christie Laugh
headline.main: Christie Laughed When Told of 2013 Bridge Plot, Former Ally Testifies

snippet: David Wildstein, the mastermind behind the lane closings, said Gov. Chris Christie was informed of the lane closings at a Sept. 11 memorial service the week they were happening....
abstract: David Wildstein, former ally of New Jersey Gov Chris Christie who orchestrated Sept 2013 George Washington Bridge lane closings, testifies in federal court that Christie laughed when told about it two days after they began; says Christie, who was told they were done to punish Fort Lee, NJ, mayor who did not endorse him for re-election, seemed to relish scheme.

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Port Authority of New York and New Jersey
